conclusion: Determine total stopping distance to see if the puppy is safe.
Break down the problem into reaction time distance and deceleration distance.
Reaction time is 0.5 seconds and speed during reaction is 20 m/s.
Calculate distance covered during reaction time: 10 m.
Initial speed is 20 m/s, final speed is 0 m/s, and time to stop is 4 seconds.
Calculate distance covered during deceleration: 40 m.
Compare stopping distance with distance to puppy: puppy is not safe.
Final answer: The puppy is not safe.
